Composite workflow macros (session boot, thread prep, reservation cycles, contact handshake)

Usage: am macros <COMMAND>

Commands:
  start-session           Boot a project session: ensure project, register agent, reserve files, fetch inbox
  prepare-thread          Align with an existing thread: register agent, summarize thread, fetch inbox
  file-reservation-cycle  Reserve files and optionally release them at the end
  contact-handshake       Request contact approval, optionally auto-approve, and send a welcome message
  help                    Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Options:
  -h, --help  Print help
